LanguageData.MessageLinked: Shelves are now linked and powered. Transfer is active.
LanguageData.MessageUnlinked: Link to output shelf has been removed.
LanguageData.MessageOverflowOn: Overflow mode enabled. Items will be dropped nearby when shelf is full.
LanguageData.MessageOverflowOff: Overflow mode disabled. Transfer will stop when shelf is full.
LanguageData.MessageTransferFailed: Transfer failed: output shelf is full.
LanguageData.StatusLinkedToSenderShelf: Status: Linked to a sender shelf.
LanguageData.StatusNotLinkedToSenderShelf: Status: Not linked to any sender shelf.
LanguageData.StatusLinkedToReceiverShelf: Status: Linked to a receiver shelf.
LanguageData.StatusNotLinkedToReceiverShelf: Status: Not linked to any receiver shelf.
LanguageData.LinkReceiverShelfDesc: Assign a receiver shelf to transfer items to automatically.
LanguageData.UnlinkReceiverShelfDesc: Unlink the currently assigned receiver shelf.
LanguageData.AllowOverflowDesc: Toggle to allow items to overflow when the receiver shelf is full.
LanguageData.ToggleAutoTransferDesc: Toggle automatic item transfer from sender to receiver shelf.
